page.title: 12Jersey Royal Potato 1.
page.content: About lOO years ago the Jersey Royal was first cultivated taking over from cider to become the main agricultural export. The Royal or "New Potato" is popular because of its small kidney shape and fresh taste. From digging to the U.K. market takes only 48 hours. It is an early potato so its success relies on its reaching the market before the other varieties. To grow well the Royal needs plenty of sun, a little rain and no ground frost. Warm humid weather can lead to potato blight, so the crops are sprayed against it, not always effectively. Another threat is the black and yellow striped Colorado beetle which can destroy the crop very quickly. It is carried by easterly winds from France to Jersey. If the beetle is seen the whole island is on the alert because of the damage it can cause.
